thread.title: Britney Spears Back in Studio for New Album
thread.title_full: Britney Spears Back in Studio for New Album

title: Britney Spears Back in Studio for New Album
text:
Photos The pop star has confirmed she's working on a new album by posting photos of her and collaborators DJ Burns and Mischke Butler | Photo: Instagram 
LOS ANGELES: Britney Spears fans have a reason to rejoice. The pop star has confirmed she's working on a new album by posting photos of her and collaborators DJ Burns and Mischke Butler. 
Spears teased her studio work with DJ Burns and songwriter Mischke Butler in several Instagram pictures on Thursday, reports aceshowbiz.com. 
"Making magic in the studio with @thisisburns4real yesterday!" Spears captioned the first picture of her and the English music producer. 
The second photo had her posing with both Burns and Butler. 
The collaborators also shared the studio time pics on their respective accounts. 
"Hey @britneyspears I'm sorry I'm so tall, we made some though so it's cool," Burns captioned it. 
Meanwhile, Butler wrote, "Re post! Always amazing working with @britneyspears & @thisisburns4real." 
Butler is a Grammy-nominated songwriter who has worked with Michael Jackson, Jennifer Lopez, The Pussycat Dolls, Jessica Simpson and Trey Songz. 
As for Burns, he worked on Midnight Star's "Midas Touch" with Ellie Goulding and remixed such singles as Lana Del Rey's "National anthem", Iggy Azalea's "Work" and Calvin Harris' "Blame". 
The effort would be the first release since Spears' eighth studio album, "Britney Jean", which was released back in December 2013. 
She has also been working with producer DJ Mustard, singer Sam Bruno and songwriter Matthew Koma.
